sentences.english: I fell seriously ill with stomach problems after eating Peter's cooking.
sentences.chinese: 我吃了彼得做的菜以後，我的胃痛得好厲害哦。

sentences.english: The medicine did his stomachache a power of good.
sentences.chinese: 這種藥對他的胃痛療效顯著。

sentences.english: Father doctored me for ordinary stomachache.
sentences.chinese: 父親爲我治療一般的胃痛。

sentences.english: Bananas will settle an upset stomach. Ginger will cure morning sickness and nausea.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉可以緩解胃痛，而生薑則可醫治晨吐及反胃。

sentences.english: But though it could relieve a painful stomach, sleeping on your side could worsen wrinkles.
sentences.chinese: 但是儘管有助於緩解胃痛，側睡可能會加重你的皺紋。

sentences.english: His stomachache has disimproved greatly from too much drinking.
sentences.chinese: 他的胃痛因喝酒過多而惡化了。

sentences.english: My stomachache may have something to do with the food I ate yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我的胃痛可能與我昨天喫的東西有關係。

sentences.english: It's not surprising you've got stomachache. After all, you've eaten too much.
sentences.chinese: 你的胃痛並不奇怪，畢竟你喫得實在太多了。

sentences.english: When u feel stomach-ache, press the point which I showed you before.
sentences.chinese: 當你胃痛時，按那個之前我顯示給你看的穴位。

sentences.english: You need some rest since you have a stomachache.
Severe stomach pain could be a sign of appendicitis .
sentences.chinese: 劇烈的胃痛可能是盲腸炎的徵兆。

sentences.english: She gave some medicine to me when my stomach griped.
sentences.chinese: 我胃痛時她給了我一些藥。

sentences.english: Needless to say, both Ann and William fell ill with stomach ache and vomiting.
sentences.chinese: 不用說，安與威廉都出現了胃痛和嘔吐的症狀。
